comment._content: Here's the Wikipedia article on "Admiral of the Fleet John Arbuthnot 'Jacky' Fisher, 1st Baron Fisher of Kilverstone."

comment.author: 61309924@N00
comment._content: This looks like a younger Jackie Fisher than 1910-1915. By 1914 he was going senile before Churchill brought him back. He looks in his prime here when he modernized (went to oil) the British navy. Did not work out too well in WWI. He went bonkers.
